title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 September 2014 - XWiki

08:43 <msmeria> tmortagne: good morning  
08:44 <tmortagne> msmeria: good morning :)  
08:45 <msmeria> can you add the translations from the Polls app (https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/application-polls/tree/master/src/main/resources/Polls) to the l10n wiki (http://l10n.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Contrib/WebHome) ?  
08:46 <msmeria> I don't have rights or the know-how...  
08:47 <tmortagne> sure  
08:50 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:59 <mflorea> has quit  
09:04 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
09:06 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:10 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
09:23 <vmassol> tmortagne: I think you're right regarding the spam, we seem to have a bit more than before every day....  
09:24 <tmortagne> yep looks like it  
09:25 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <vmassol> guys, would be great if we could RC1 today  
09:25 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <vmassol> restarting platform build  
09:27 <vmassol> how is it going for the ui tests fixing?  
09:28 <vmassol> I see there are still 19 failing for ui-tests  
09:28 <vmassol> s/ui-tests/test-ui  
09:28 <vmassol> only 2 remaining for test-wysiwyg  
09:28 <tmortagne> most AWM failing test are supposed to be fixed by Guillaume by now  
09:29 <vmassol> so it didn't rebuild?  
09:29 <vmassol> I thought we committed yesterday evening  
09:29 <vmassol> s/we/he  
09:29 <tmortagne> that's XWIKI-10943  
09:29 <vmassol> hmm seems  
09:29 <vmassol> platform didn't build fine since yesterday morning 11AM  
09:32 <vmassol> I think we can finish fixing the test this morning and start the release beginning of afternoon  
09:32 <vmassol> that would be cool  
09:32 <vmassol> that would leave one more week for 6.2 final  
09:32 <vmassol> we still have around 5 issues planned for 6.2 final  
09:33 <tmortagne> there is XWIKI-10935 remaining  
09:34 <tmortagne> did not really looked the details yet  
09:35 <tmortagne> looks likes something is trying to use translations for a deleted wiki between it's deleted and translation component are cleaned  
09:35 <polx> has quit  
09:35 <tmortagne> the issue with listener not have priorities...  
09:35 <tmortagne> I don't think it's really a blocker technically as it just produce log  
09:36 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <polx> has quit

11:16 <vmassol> hmm http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/6016/console isn't moving much at all  
11:16 <vmassol> been watching it for 30 seconds without it moving....  
11:16 <vmassol> could be low memory  
11:16 <vmassol> I think it's not been moving for something like 30 minutes or so now  
11:23 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:39 <Denis> has quit  
12:44 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:51 <polx> has quit  
12:56 <Denis> has quit  
12:57 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
13:10 <Denis> has quit  
13:31 <vmassol> so the platform build timed out in the end: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/6016/console  
13:31 <vmassol> which is also what happened for the previous build: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/6015/console  
13:32 <vmassol> but not at the same place during the build....  
13:32 <vmassol> ah gd is not working today… :(  
13:33 <vmassol> so there's little chance he'll continue fixing the ui issues  
13:42 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
13:48 <vmassol> going to perform some deep cleaning of our jenkins instance and then I'll try to downgrade to the latest LTS version  
13:48 <vmassol> (after copying the .hudson directory)  
13:48 <vmassol> so tighten your seat belts, it might be chaotic for a few hours… :)

14:21 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
14:22 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
14:23 <DarkKnightCZ> Hi, is there some persistent cache for .vm files? I've modified commentsinline.vm in templates/ folder but after restart it's still loading the original file  
14:23 <vmassol> no cache  
14:23 <vmassol> you don't even need to restart  
14:25 <DarkKnightCZ> hmm, weird  
14:47 <tmortagne> DarkKnightCZ: try cleaning your browser cache but I don't see why it would cache that either  
14:47 <tmortagne> on server side there is cache only for macros.vm  
14:49 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
14:53 <vmassol> can someone handle the repo request from ludovic, I'm busy on jeknins ATM… :)  
15:02 <tmortagne> don  
15:02 <tmortagne> done  
15:02 <vmassol> cool  
15:02 <vmassol> he'll probably need a jira… even though he didn't ask…
